item.title:
Pedro Pascal and Ethan Hawke in Pedro Almodóvar’s queer Western short ‘STRANGE WAY OF LIFE.’
Described as “a very intimate portrait of masculinity.”

item.title:
‘QUEEN CHARLOTTE: A BRIDGERTON STORY’ is now streaming on Netflix.
It currently holds a Rotten Tomatoes score of 96%.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Brie Larson, Paul Dano & Julia Ducournau join the 76th Cannes Film Festival jury.
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/cannes-film-festival-2023-jury-members-1235355549/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Amy Adams, Paul Rudd and Tessa Thompson to star in comedy ‘THE INVITE’.
It follows a middle-aged couple who are feeling stagnant in their relationship and invite the couple from upstairs, who they find out are hosting weekly orgies and have an invite of their own to offer.
item.author: FilmUpdates
